Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Columbus in 1973...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/1/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $1,290,000 per year...
Traded from Plum Grove to Bay City on 7/30/1988 (Going to BC: SS C. Wiggins. Going to PG: P C. Partida)...
